description: This file defines the main index route component for a recipe browsing web application using Remix. It includes loader function for fetching recipe data, React component to render the search interface, recipe cards, and pagination, along with meta information.

methods.name: meta
methods.description: Sets the page's meta tags for the recipe explorer site, including title and description.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Async function that fetches recipes based on query parameters q and page, returning data for rendering.
